name: Bare Hook
description: Simple fishhook with no special qualities

name: Fly Hook
description: Catches have a higher chance of being smaller fish

name: Lucky Hook
description: Gain a small amount of cash on every catch

name: Patient Lure
description: Catches wait for your input before beginning to reel in

name: Quick Jig
description: Reel Quicker and gain Rod Power

name: Salty Lure
description: Always catch Saltwater fish, no matter the body of water.

name: Fresh Lure
description: Always catch Freshwater fish, no matter the body of water.

name: Efficient Lure
description: Chance to not consume bait on catch

name: Magnet Lure
description: Higher chance of catching treasure (and garbage...)

name: Large Lure
description:
Higher chance of catching bigger fish
... chance to consume extra bait on catch

name: Sparkling Lure
description:
Higher chance of catching greater tiers of fish
... chance to consume extra bait on catch

name: Double Hook
description:
Low Chance of doubling fish on catch
... chance to consume extra bait on catch

name: Golden Hook
description:
Higher chance of catching extremely rare fish
... always consumes 3x bait.

name: Challenge Lure
description: Popups appear during the fishing minigame, clicking them gives cash- but missing them hurts you!

name: Shower Lure
description: On catch, small chance to summon a tiny rainstorm above you.
